Topic.Title: Help me with translate the text of a new game in QUEST 5

Posts.EditableText:
Well...
I'm Jhames.
I am a spanish guy.
I wrote a game in QUEST 5. (in spanish)
The name is:    
NEARCO II - "The perdition of the nymph".
(A greek general under Alexander the Great)

I'm trying to translate to a english language to share with that comunity...

But.. my english isn't very good. So...
I trying to find people to help me to correct the text that I translate already to english.
Not that they translate. (Very hard). Of course, that is my charge.

And after that, do a betatesting to know if work in english language.

Any people interested can contact with me in:
Bolumbero(a)hotmail.com

Posts.EditableText: Hi guys, I think this game gone missing after the death of Jhames. I have the file game from the caad but it's showing a bug. Is there a way to fix it? It has the extension .quest I can't attach it, it says: The file is too big, maximum allowed size is 256 KiB. Here is the link to download: http://www.caad.es/sites/default/files/ ... 20II.quest
Posts.HTML:
Hi guys, I think this game gone missing after the death of Jhames.

I have the file game from the caad but it's showing a bug.

Is there a way to fix it? It has the extension .quest

I can't attach it, it says: The file is too big, maximum allowed size is 256 KiB.

Here is the link to download:

http://www.caad.es/sites/default/files/ ... 20II.quest

Posts.EditableText: no problem. Open the .quest file with a zipper (7z for example) and replace the game.aslx there with the appended file
Posts.HTML:
no problem. Open the .quest file with a zipper (7z for example) and replace the game.aslx there with the appended file
game.aslx
